data.title: Contact Us
data.text:
Phone numbers and email addresses for many common topics are listed below. For general information, or if you aren't sure which program or office you need to contact, you can email us at [email protected].

Note: All media inquiries from reporters should be sent to the DEC press office at [email protected].

If you are having trouble finding a person to help you, you can contact DEC's Bureau of Public Outreach at [email protected] or 518-402-8044.

Get in touch with us by mail at:

New York State Department of Environmental Conservation

625 Broadway

Albany, New York 12233-0001
